text:
Scarlett Johansson joined fellow "Captain America: Civil War" stars Chris Evans and Anthony Mackie on the set Friday afternoon.
UPDATES:

The Marvel project, headquartered out of the new Pinewood Studios facility in Fayetteville, was shooting in downtown Atlanta.
Earlier in the week it filmed at Peachtree Christian Church in Midtown and Fado Irish Pub in Buckhead.
